member.name: M:TypTop.Repository.ILevelRepository.AddLevel(System.Int32,System.Int32,TypTop.Shared.WinConditionType,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Adds level with given values to the database. WordProvider as JSON string ( JsonConvert.SerializeObject() ). Variables as Dictionary. WORLDID IS DATABASE ID, NOT INDEX. Use UnitOfWork.Complete() to save in db.
